items.name: Beast Mitts
implicitMods: 0.2% of Cold Damage Leeched as Life
15% chance to Unnerve Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit
explicitMods: +56 to Dexterity
+58 to maximum Life
Regenerate 5.3 Mana per second
+47% to Cold Resistance
46% increased Damage with Hits against Chilled Enemies
craftedMods: Can have up to 3 Crafted Modifiers
24% increased Damage during any Flask Effect

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies, and makes your spells deal more lightning damage.
explicitMods: +2 metres to radius
You and nearby allies deal 17 to 267 additional Lightning Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal 21% more Spell Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that create permanent auras around you, changing their reservation to a cost and making them temporary. Cannot support banner or stance skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 34% increased Aura effect
Supported Skills Cost +233 Mana

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Auras from Supported Skills have a base duration of 10.90 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill. Minions, Totems, Traps and Mines cannot gain Inspiration Charges.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 44% reduced Mana Cost

Gain an Inspiration Charge when you Spend Mana on Upfront
Costs or Effects of Supported Skills
Lose all Inspiration Charges after Spending a total of 800 Mana on Upfront Costs and Effects of Supported Skills
Supported Skills deal 5% more Elemental Damage per Inspiration Charge
Supported Skills have 8% increased Critical Strike Chance per Inspiration Charge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 20% reduced Mana Cost
Supported Skills have 20% reduced Life Cost
Supported Skills have 54% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Replica Dragonfang's Flight
explicitMods: +3 to Level of all Storm Brand Gems
+12% to all Elemental Resistances
15% increased Reservation Efficiency of Skills
Items and Gems have 13% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: "Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."

items.name: The Oppressor
explicitMods: -10% to amount of Suppressed Spell Damage Prevented
+30% chance to Suppress Spell Damage
231% increased Armour and Evasion
+11% Chance to Block
You take 20% of Damage from Blocked Hits
flavourText: Every clash leaves one more scar.

explicitMods: This Gem gains 100% increased Experience
+8% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
